quest.name: Floating Like Clouds
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
The enthusiastic observer needs help retrieving lost plants.
objectives: Deliver the tufts of cloud mallow to the enthusiastic observer.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04299
dialogue.text: What a sight! An ampelos sneezed and sent tufts of cloud mallow flying every which way.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04299
dialogue.text: But while highly amusing, I'll never be able to gather them all up alone...unless you're willing to lend a hand?

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04299
dialogue.text: Thank you so much! Let's split up and start looking for them.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04299
dialogue.text: Be on the lookout for fluffy white plants floating around Poieten Oikos, and bring any you find back here.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04299
dialogue.text: Did you find any of the plants?

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04299
dialogue.text: Perfect! It's such a relief to have them back...

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04299
dialogue.text: A somewhat amateur creator invented the concept to bring more life into the clouds. Which is all well and good, but they get blown away far too easily.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04299
dialogue.text: It would be nice if they were a bit more wind resistant... We need to know they can settle in a place without fear of them flying off because some beast breathed on them too hard.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04299
dialogue.text: Well, I'd better put them back where they belong before a light breeze undoes all your hard work. Here, take this as thanks for your help.
